metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Romantic Children is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Romantic Children has sections analyzed in the following keys: C♯ Minor, G Minor,  and G♯ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
